content:
/>
XIV.4.B.2.g
.
Destroying Contents of the Paper FTI File
An FTI folder and its contents may be destroyed three years after a final decision, based on Federal tax return information, has been made by the VSC, PMC, or appellate body.  Any identifying information on the file will be shredded.
Exception
:  The IVM
worksheet
from a case requiring a benefit adjustment may be destroyed 30 days after the decision becomes final.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
